name: Ancient Love
description:
Coded in 3 hours for TriJam 124 "Dead Last"

An additional hour was spend just scrolling through opengameart.org looking for ideas, but that doesn't count :P

Licenses for graphics and sound files used:

Title:

    public domain portraits

Author:

    qubodup

URL:

    https://opengameart.org/content/public-domain-portraits

License(s):

    * CC0 ( http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/legalcode )

File(s):

    * license-all.zip
